TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WindowManagerTypes extends System.Enum

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes ApplicationAttachedDialog = int32(1003)
ApplicationAttachedDialog = 1003

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes InputMethod = int32(2011)
InputMethod = 2011

Docs.summary: Window type: internal input methods windows, which appear above the normal UI.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes InputMethodDialog = int32(2012)
InputMethodDialog = 2012

Docs.summary: Window type: internal input methods dialog windows, which appear above the current input method window. In multiuser systems shows only on the owning user's window.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes Keyguard = int32(2004)
Keyguard = 2004

Docs.summary: Window type: keyguard window. In multiuser systems shows on all users' windows.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes KeyguardDialog = int32(2009)
KeyguardDialog = 2009

StatusBarPanel = 2014

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes SystemAlert = int32(2003)
SystemAlert = 2003

Docs.summary: Window type: system window, such as low power alert.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes SystemDialog = int32(2008)
SystemDialog = 2008

Docs.summary: Window type: panel that slides out from the status bar In multiuser systems shows on all users' windows.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes SystemError = int32(2010)
SystemError = 2010

Docs.summary: Window type: internal system error windows, appear on top of everything they can. In multiuser systems shows only on the owning user's window.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes SystemOverlay = int32(2006)
SystemOverlay = 2006

Docs.summary: Window type: system overlay windows, which need to be displayed on top of everything else.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes Toast = int32(2005)
Toast = 2005

Docs.summary: Window type: transient notifications. In multiuser systems shows only on the owning user's window.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.WindowManagerTypes Wallpaper = int32(2013)
Wallpaper = 2013

Docs.summary: Window type: wallpaper window, placed behind any window that wants to sit on top of the wallpaper. In multiuser systems shows only on the owning user's window.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
